import React from 'react'; import Modal from 'react-modal'; import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; const customStyles = { content: { top: '50%', left: '50%', right: 'auto', bottom: 'auto', marginRight: '-50%', transform: 'translate(-50%, -50%)' } }; Modal.setAppElement('#root') const ApointmentForm = ({ modalIsOpen, closeModal, apointmentOn, date }) => { const { register, handleSubmit, watch, formState: { errors } } = useForm(); const onSubmit = data => console.log(data); return (

{apointmentOn}


ON {date.toDateString()}
); }; export default ApointmentForm;
